title.value: Создание национальной коллекции сортов-эталонов для идентификации признаков у фасоли обыкновенной (Phaseolus vulgaris L.)
National collection of standard varieties creation for traits identification in kidney bean (Phaseolus vulgaris L.)

journal.title: Agriculture and Plant Protection : scientific-practical journal

person.name: Russkikh, I.A., Belarus State Univ., Minsk (Belarus)
Semashko, T.V., State Inspection for Testing and Protection of Plant Varieties of Belarus (Belarus)
Vasilevskaya, T.I., Kobrin Variety Testing Station, Kobrin, (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there was realized a creation of the national collections of model standard varieties of kidney bean (Phaseolus vulgaris L.). In course of the study there was realized collection, accumulation and introduction study of a wide spectrum of collection samples of kidney beans; evaluation of a complex of traits of collection varieties for obtaining UPOV-descriptions of the studied samples in accordance with the UPOV TG/12/9 methods; selection of candidates into group of the national standard sample varieties carrying strongly pronounced identification traits; analysis of a complex of identification traits of candidates into model standard collection. As a result of long-term field and laboratory tests of more than 1 500 common bean varieties of 48 traits (173 states of expression of characters in the aggregate) the 99 varieties were included into the national germplasm collection of example varieties. These varieties are recommended to be used in national DUS-testing system and PBR granting.
